definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)

sentences.english: Methods The operation consisted of using fibula to block the posterior ankle.
sentences.chinese: 方法取胖骨在踝後作制動的跟骨阻擋術。

sentences.english: Describe what the electron blocking layer is, and then express the function of EBL.
sentences.chinese: 說明電子阻擋層是什麼，然後表示兼EBL功能。

sentences.english: Although the wind turned the tides time and time again against him.
sentences.chinese: 儘管風捲得如浪潮一樣一次又一次地阻擋他。

sentences.english: Officials want to make sure the levee can hold back the additional water.
sentences.chinese: 官員們希望，以確保大堤能阻擋的額外的水。

sentences.english: Rosetting contributes to severe malaria by blocking the flow of blood through small blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 通過阻擋血流通過小血管，花結對重症瘧疾也有貢獻。

sentences.english: You are very self-assured and you implement ideas with a self- assurance that lets nothing get in your way of success.
sentences.chinese: 你充滿自信，確信沒有什麼能阻擋你走向成功。

sentences.english: It is the best to observe this eclipse at locations not obscured to the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 最佳觀測地點爲西南面沒有阻擋的場地。

sentences.english: Technical onrush always is billow forward, vast and mighty, cannot hold back.
sentences.chinese: 技術洪流總是滾滾向前，浩浩蕩蕩，無法阻擋。

sentences.english: Heat losses from the reservoir by heat conduction cannot be prevented .
sentences.chinese: 熱儲通過熱傳導的熱損耗是無法阻擋的。

sentences.english: 'Cause I've spent half my life out there, you wouldn't disagree.
sentences.chinese: 由於爾在表面功了泰半的時光，你們不會阻擋的。

sentences.english: Zin Zhao is so OP that he CAN stop mundo from going where he pleases!
sentences.chinese: 趙信太OP所以他能阻擋蒙多到他想去的地方。

sentences.english: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.
sentences.chinese: 所有能夠阻擋妖精吟遊詩人的生物皆須阻擋之。

sentences.english: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.
sentences.chinese: 所有能夠阻擋妖精吟遊詩人的生物皆須阻擋之。

sentences.english: It is therefore an unstoppable tide of history.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它是一個不可阻擋的歷史潮流。

sentences.english: Please cover a blanket on the infants in case of the cold wind.
sentences.chinese: 請給嬰兒們蓋上一牀毛毯以阻擋冷風。

sentences.english: The birds provide homes for tree mallow which then prevents them breeding.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類提供阻擋他們繁殖的花葵最好的家園。

definition: to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
